section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The Marine Division (MD) develops the global growth strategy for Alfa Laval’s activities towards the Marine industries.  
 
The Division includes both capital and aftermarket sales within Marine Offshore Pumping Systems, Marine & Offshore Systems and Marine Equipment, Operations, Product Centre Boilers and support functions.
relevant_communication: Follows the development and advices on technical matters
